Html:
Hi

Small request: Can you make the ToolTip Font Color an accessible property? With some map types the default Navy color is barely visible (e.g. Google Satellite).

In GMapToolTip.cs:

 

g.DrawString(Marker.ToolTipText, Font, Brushes.Navy, rect, Format);

Thanks!

On 17 February 2011 20:58, radioman <notifications@codeplex.com> wrote:

From: radioman

done! Thx
